name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess expertise in C/C++, **Linux**, **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, **Microservices**, **CI/CD**, and **Terraform**. I have a proven track record in developing and deploying high-performance, scalable solutions, leveraging my strong foundations in **Python** and **Golang**. My experience includes designing and implementing robust systems utilizing concepts such as **Network Segmentation**, **Virtualization**, and **Multithreading**. 
I excel in building microservices and crafting CI/CD pipelines, ensuring efficient and secure software delivery practices. Additionally, I have an in-depth understanding of performance optimization techniques and network function virtualization (**NFV**), enabling me to deliver solutions that meet strict compliance standards. Alongside this, I have hands-on experience with embedded systems and software forwarding, enriching my capability to contribute effectively in complex technical environments. 
I am committed to fostering innovation through integration of cutting-edge technologies and methodologies in my work.
